about_the_game:
Climb up the ranks and claim your spot among the greatest mechanical fighters in this vintage Atompunk / Electro Swing themed auto-battler! Pick your nation and outfit your boxer with a variety of different robot parts, punch card abilities and league belts to assemble a fighter to your liking that excels in speed, strength, endurance or a balanced mix coupled with special properties on each part.

Your loyal crew stationed on the backside of your mechanical fighter will do their best to pilot and execute basic attacks. All while loading and activating abilities will be up to you by completing light rhythm tapping challenges synced with music beats. Should your crew run into trouble you can override their input to better manage the processor or heat limitations of your fighter.

Components of your robot are likely to succumb to the heavy hits of your opponent and eventually break, however repairs can be applied between round breaks. So too will any crew members dazed from battle recover during a round break, restoring their role specific perks they provide (Captain, Driver, Arms or Systems).

With depletion of systems health comes a countdown, giving the downed robot only 10 seconds to reboot or lose the match.

In career mode you'll navigate through a series of daily manager events that earn you resources to unlock new robot parts, robot abilities and passive crew skills.

Welcome to Emprum Stadium, host of the Electro Bop boxing league!
